about_the_game:
The Portal: Revolution Plush Pack replaces the Weighted Storage Cubes with Aperture's latest Hydrophobic Rigid-Body Storage Pillow Cubes.

Support the developers of Portal: Revolution and reward yourself with another plush that will make a fine addition to your collection.

To return the cubes to their original form, simply disable the DLC in the Steam settings.

Plush Pack Contents

  • Standard Cube replacement (Hydrophobic Rigid-Body Storage Pillow Cube)
  • Companion Cube replacement (Hydrophobic Rigid-Body Companion Pillow Cube)

Plush Cube Key Features

  • Water-resistant
  • Not Acid-resistant
  • Made from high quality fabric inspired by 100% organic materials
  • Military-grade stitching
  • Non-deforming
  • Precisely calibrated to match the mass of metal boxes
  • 100% Bulletproof
  • Transmutates into metal gibs when burnt in a high oven or shredded
